td.content: s:a 58 yo white male chief of police presents with Body Aches x 6 days. denies any smoking Patient reports that he never drinks alcohol o:Height 162 cm, Weight 90.9 kg, Temperature 37.2 C, Pulse 89, SystolicBP 103, DiastolicBP 63, Respiration 16 a:Osteoarthritis p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed diclofenac - 200 mg daily, and ordered Hand Xray.

s:patient presents with 4 weeks history of Body Aches. pt is a M chief of police aged 59 yrs. o:Height 162 cm, Weight 91.7 kg, Temperature 37.1 C, Pulse 73, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 67, Respiration 15 a:Osteoarthritis p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed naproxen - 500 mg up to 3x day, and ordered Hand Xray.
